item.title: Preview the SG50 National Day promotion at Fairmont Singapore
item.description:
To commemorate Singapore’s 50th anniversary, the Fairmont Singapore is offering a special package. This package provides guests with a prime location to view the fireworks display during the National Day preview parade on August 1st. Ranging from S$400++ to S$750++ for a one-night stay, the package includes a premium room with views of Marina Bay and the Padang. Guests will also enjoy complimentary breakfast for two and a 24-hour self-parking coupon at Raffles City Shopping Centre...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/preview-the-sg50-national-day-promotion-at-fairmont-singapore/

item.title: Huawei joins Singaporeans in celebrating National Day
item.description:
In honor of Singapore’s 55th birthday, Huawei collaborated with five local photographers: Bryan van der Beek, Don Lee, Junaidi Lim, Zipeng Lee, and Jovanne Amolat. These photographers used the HUAWEI P40 Series smartphones to capture the spirit of Singapore by showcasing unique perspectives on everyday scenes. Fresh Perspectives of the Familiar Through thoughtful composition and utilizing the depth of field capabilities of the HUAWEI P40 Series, these photos provide a fresh perspective on common sights...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/huawei-joins-singaporeans-in-celebrating-national-day/
